attributes.action: use his remaining days and power to force the FA to sack Steve McClaren from his post as England manager
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Steve McClaren was part of the previous regime that saw England football team become a boring passionless team.  McClaren has continued this in his roll as manager and has even built on it so that Sven now looks like he was a great and charismatic manager in comparison.  If McClaren does not go very soon England fans will all be able to plan their 2008 summer holidays without worrying about clashes with England matches in the European Championship.  Sign the petition and lets get McClaren out!!

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "use his remaining days and power to force the FA to sack Steve McClaren from his post as England manager."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11846.asp

Prime Minister's Office
